participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nostalgic, enjoys sharing memories and connecting with others over shared experiences.
participant_1.background: I take walks with my mom and do yoga at home. I collect books to keep my reading ability sharp. I miss my cat but I love jazz. I dressed up as a cat last Halloween. I play games at the arcade, still.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and active, loves outdoor activities and has a balanced view on life.
participant_2.background: I'm not a big fan of dressing up, but I do like to wear comfortable clothes. I helped develop Facebook. I go for a walk with my dogs every day. I am terrified of spiders, but love snakes. I love to ride bikes.

content.text: Hey, what's up?
Hi there! Not much, just got back from a walk with my dogs.
Nice! What kind of dogs do you have?
I have a labradoodle and a golden retriever.
Aww, that sounds adorable! I'm a cat person myself.
I'm not a big fan of cats, but they're cute.
Yeah, they are. I had a cat for 10 years but he passed away last year.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that.
Thanks. I miss him a lot.
I know how you feel. I lost my childhood dog a few years ago.
Yeah, it's never easy.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the arcade.
Oh, really? I haven't been to an arcade in years.
Yeah, I go pretty often. I love to play video games.
I'm not really a gamer, but I do love riding bikes.
Oh, that's fun too. I used to ride bikes a lot when I was younger.
Yeah, I still ride my bike every day. It's a great way to get exercise.
Yeah, it is. I should probably start riding my bike more often.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks, I might just do that.
